reviews.author: Coffee Enthusiast
reviews.text: My favourite coffee in Berlin, really friendly staff and super cozy atmosphere. The focaccia sandwiches are perfectly prepared!

reviews.author: Berlin Visitor
reviews.text: Vielleicht das beste Café Berlins! Great espresso and the Portuguese desserts are amazing. Very affordable prices.

reviews.author: Local Regular
reviews.text: Delicious coffee prepared by uber-friendly staff. The croissants and berliner are tasty. Perfect neighborhood spot in Kreuzberg.

reviews.author: Food Lover
reviews.text: Great service and comfortable atmosphere. Try the breakfast sandwiches and filet américain - they're cooked to perfection!
